title: Happy Happy Paul!
content: Happy Bday Paul Hunt! Have a ncie day, see you in Buffalo.
author: Ale Paul

comments.content:
Yes Paul, have a Happy one...

dr
Alles Gute zum Geburtstag, Paul! Viel Spaß diese Wochenende in Paris.
Happy Birthday! Have a great one!
B-day weekend in Paris? Magic! I know it will be special; enjoy it!

thanks for the well wishes everybody! it's been lovely thus far and should prove to be a nice weekend. I hope. the past week has been nice overall, esp now that my italic is falling into place. That made me really happy. ;^D
Feliz Aniversário. Paris, hummm, sounds expensive. If you can go see [Ingres](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019191616/http:/artchive.com/artchive/I/ingres/turkbath.jpg.html) in the Louvre ;-)
Happy Birthday, Paul. Have a nice weekend in Paris and do try to see the Eiffel Tower this time. ;^P

お誕生日、おめでとうございます！  
Happy Birthday!

thnx again everyone! i had a very animated birthday. \>^p

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019191616im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pdhsimpson_4880.png)
A very Happy (albeit belated) Birthday, Paul.
So now that you've recovered from the B-day weekend in Paree, what's this about your italic? Can you show some? The pics of the roman on your flickr page are tantalizing but mysterious.
Late to the party. All the best, Paul!

Versailles and [French lettering](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019191616/http:/www.flickr.com/search/?w=28786002%40N00&q=france+lettering&m=text) pics on flickr.

Carl, thanks for your expression of interest! I promise to send you something to look at as soon as I think it would be worth your time to have a look at. Hopefully that will be very soon--within the next week. I'll be in touch! :^D
